document.full_text: a former wikileaks spokesman has condemned julian assange for demanding workers for the website sign "confidentiality agreements" threatening penalties of up to 12 million british pounds ($19.5 million).
document.title: ex-wikileaks spokesman attacks assange "gag" orders
lines_and_colors: a former wikileaks spokesman has condemned julian assange for demanding workers for the website sign "confidentiality agreements" threatening penalties of up to 12 million british pounds ($19.5 million).
